title: Project Management Immersive Learning Based on Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic project management principles
context.additional_context: Provision of simulation-based collaborative learning environments utilizing virtual world platforms

learning_goals: They can simulate project planning and execution processes in virtual world environments.
They apply risk management and decision-making strategies through online collaboration with team members.
They solve project scheduling adjustments and resource allocation problems using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
